words.def: any physical damage to the body caused by violence or accident or fracture etc.
meat cut from the thigh of a hog (usually smoked)
A person especially a student with a posh accent who looks down on those who are 'common'.
the month following February and preceding April
the most common computer memory which can be used by programs to perform necessary tasks while the computer is on
An instance of the interjection ah.
(astronomy) the angular distance of a celestial point measured westward along the celestial equator from the zenith crossing
a colorless and odorless inert gas
